typedecl.typehead:
dlog_optattr() = name
| file
| linkto
| repair
| type
| format
| size
| distributed
| notify
| head
| head_func
| mode

dlog_size() = infinity
| integer() >= 1
| {MaxNoBytes :: integer() >= 1,
MaxNoFiles :: integer() >= 1}

clause.head:
do_log(Log ::
#log{status = dlog_status(),
name = undefined | dlog_name(),
blocked_by = none | pid(),
users = integer() >= 0,
filename = undefined | file:filename(),
owners = [{pid(), boolean()}],
type = dlog_type(),
format = dlog_format(),
format_type = undefined | dlog_format_type(),
head = any(),
mode = undefined | dlog_mode(),
size = any(),
extra = undefined
| #halt{fdc = undefined
| #cache{fd = undefined
| file:fd(),
sz =
integer() >= 0,
c = iodata()},
curB = undefined
| integer() >= 0,
size = undefined | dlog_size()}
| #handle{filename = undefined
| file:filename(),
maxB = undefined | integer() >= 1,
maxF = undefined
| integer() >= 1
| {integer() >= 1,
integer() >= 1},
curB = undefined
| integer() >= 0,
curF = undefined | integer(),
cur_fdc = undefined
| #cache{fd = undefined
| file:fd(),
sz =
integer() >= 0,
c = iodata()},
cur_name = undefined
| file:filename(),
cur_cnt = undefined
| integer() >= 0,
acc_cnt = undefined
| integer() >= 0,
firstPos = undefined
| integer() >= 0,
noFull = undefined
| integer() >= 0,
accFull = undefined
| integer() >= 0},
version = undefined | integer()},
B :: [binary()]) ->
integer() | {error, term(), integer()}

system_terminate(Reason :: term(),
Parent :: term(),
X3 :: term(),
State ::
#state{queue = any(),
messages = any(),
parent = any(),
server = any(),
cnt = integer() >= 0,
args = any(),
error_status = dlog_state_error(),
cache_error = any()}) ->
no_return()
